Sloka: सत्येन धार्यते पृथ्वी सत्येन तपते रविः। सत्येन वाति वायुश्च सर्वं सत्ये प्रतिष्ठितम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The earth is sustained by truth and the sun is burning with truth.By truth the wind blows everything and everything is established in truth

Sloka: नैनं छन्दांसि वृजनात् तारयन्ति मायाविंन मायया वर्तमानम्। नीडं शकुन्ता इव जातपक्षाश्छन्दांस्येनं प्रजहत्यन्तकाले ॥
EnglishTranslation: They do not save this chants from the magic, which is not present by illusion.At the end of the day, the wings of the wings of the wings of the birds, the wings of the wings, gave up the nest.

Sloka: नान्नोदकसमं दानं न तिथिर्द्वादशी समा । न गायत्र्याः परो मन्त्रो न मातुर्दैवतं परम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no gift equal to food and water, no date equal to the twelfth day.There is no mantra greater than the Gāyatrī, nor is there any greater deity than the mother.

Sloka: नास्त्यप्राप्यं सत्यवताम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is nothing to be found for the truthful.

Sloka: बलवन्तो हि अनियमाः नियमा दुर्बलीयसाम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: They are strong and irregularly regulated with the weak.

Sloka: कार्यार्थिनामुपाय एव सहायः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The means of doing the work is the only way to help.

Sloka: चत्वारि ते तात गृहे वसन्तु श्रियाभिजुष्टस्य गृहस्थधर्मे । वृद्धो ज्ञातिरवसत्रः कुलीनः सखा दरिद्रो भगिनी चानपत्या ॥
EnglishTranslation: My dear father, may you live in the house of a householder who is endowed with opulence.He was old, relatives, nobody, noble, friend, sister, sister, and unmarried.

Sloka: द्वविमौ ग्रसते भूमिः सर्पो बिलशयानिवं। राजानं चाविरोद्धारं ब्राह्मणं चाप्रवासिनम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: These two swallow the earth, the snake, like the beds of the cave.The king and the brahmins were contradictory

Sloka: काष्ठपाषाण धातुनां कृत्वा भावेन सेवनम्। श्रद्धया च तथा सिद्धिस्तस्य विष्णोः प्रसादतः॥
EnglishTranslation: Consumption with the sense of wood and stone metals.By faith and by the grace of Visnu his perfection.

Sloka: दर्शनध्यानसंस्पर्शैर्मत्स्यी कूर्मी च पक्षिणि। शिशु पालयते नित्यं तथा सज्जनसंगतिः॥
EnglishTranslation: The fish is a fish in the birds with sight, meditation and touch.The child's association with the virtuous always takes care of the child

Sloka: लुब्धमर्थेन गृह्णीयात्स्तब्धमञ्जलिकर्मणा। मूर्खश्छन्दानुरोधेन यथार्थवादेन पण्डितम्॥
EnglishTranslation: He should take the greedy meaning by the action of stupidity.A fool is a wise man by the request of the chanda and by the real argument.

Sloka: पंचेन्द्रियस्य मर्त्यस्य छिद्रं चेदेकमिन्द्रियम् । ततोऽस्य स्त्रवति प्रज्ञा दृतेः पात्रादिवोदकम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: If there is a hole in the five senses, the same sense is the same.Then the intelligence of the Lord is discharged from the water from the water from the vessel.

Sloka: कस्य दोषः कुले नास्ति व्याधिना को न पीडितः। व्यसनं केन न प्राप्तं कस्य सौख्यं निरन्तरम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Who has no fault in the family and who is not afflicted with diseaseWho has not attained adversity and whose happiness is continuous?

Sloka: कामधेनुगुणा विद्या ह्ययकाले फलदायिनी। प्रवासे मातृसदृशा विद्या गुप्तं धनं स्मृतम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Knowledge is the quality of desire and gives fruit in the time of the time.Knowledge like a mother in exile is said to be secret wealth.

Sloka: बन्धन्य विषयासङ्गः मुक्त्यै निर्विषयं मनः। मन एव मनुष्याणां कारणं बन्धमोक्षयोः॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is devoid of objects for liberation, attachment to objects.The mind itself is the cause of bondage and liberation for men.

Sloka: जीवन्तं मृतवन्मन्ये देहिनं धर्मवर्जितम्। मृतो धर्मेण संयुक्तो दीर्घजीवी न संशयः॥
EnglishTranslation: I think that the embodied is alive as a dead man is devoid of righteousness.He died with righteousness and was undoubtedly a long life.

Sloka: मनः शीघ्रतरं बातात् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is faster than the bat.

Sloka: शब्दमात्रात् न भीतव्यम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: It should not be afraid of the sound alone.

Sloka: शत्रवोऽपि हितायैव विवदन्तः परस्परम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Even the enemies were disputing with each other for the sake of their welfare

Sloka: छात्रैः परिश्रमेण पठितव्यम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Students should read with hard work.

Sloka: प्राप्नोति वै वित्तमसद्बलेन नित्योत्त्थानात् प्रज्ञया पौरुषेण। न त्वेव सम्यग् लभते प्रशंसां न वृत्तमाप्नोति महाकुलानाम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He obtains wealth by the strength of goodness, by eternal rise, wisdom and manhood.He does not get perfectly appreciated by the great families of great families.

Sloka: मनसा चिन्तितं कार्यं वाचा नैव प्रकाशयेत्। मन्त्रेण रक्षयेद् गूढं कार्य चापि नियोजयेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The work thought of the mind should not be revealed by words.With the mantra one should protect the mystery and the task should also be employed.

Sloka: आक्रोशपरिवादाभ्यां विहिंसन्त्यबुधा बुधान्। वक्ता पापमुपादत्ते क्षममाणो विमुच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: The ignorant, the wise, violate the wise in anger.A speaker includes sin and is freed from the forgiveness.

Sloka: गतानुगतिको लोकः न लोक़ः पारमार्थिकः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The world of the past is not the transcendental world.

Sloka: मातृवत् परदारेषु परद्रव्याणि लोष्ठवत्। आत्मवत् सर्वभूतानि यः पश्यति सः पण्डितः॥
EnglishTranslation: Like a mother in other wives and other things like a lip.He who sees all beings as the Self is a wise man.

Sloka: असमाहितस्य वृतिनर विद्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is a man who has no concentration.

Sloka: नव्यसनपरस्य कार्यावाप्तिः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The attainment of the work of the newly addicted.

Sloka: अस्तयभाषणं पापं वर्तते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Speaking of the situation is a sin.

Sloka: प्रियवाक्यप्रदानेन सर्वे तुष्यन्ति मानवाः । तस्मात् तदेव वक्तव्यं वचने का दरिद्रता ॥
EnglishTranslation: All human beings are pleased with the giving of pleasant wordsTherefore, what is the poverty in words?

Sloka: पितरि प्रीतिमापन्ने प्रीयन्ते सर्वदेवताः ॥
EnglishTranslation: All the demigods are pleased when they are pleased with their father.

Sloka: अनिर्वेदः श्रियो मूलं लाभस्य च शुभस्य च। महान् भवत्यनिर्विण्णः सुखं चानन्त्यमश्नुते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Anirveda is the root of prosperity, profit and good.He becomes great and undisturbed and enjoys infinite happiness.

Sloka: अकार्यकरणाद् भीतः कार्याणान्च विवर्जनात् । अकाले मन्त्रभेदाच्च येन माद्देन्न तत् पिबेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He is afraid of doing what he does not workOne should not give food to the one who gives me the difference of mantras prematurely.

Sloka: मूर्खाः यत्र न पूज्यन्ते धान्यं यत्र सुसंचितम् । दाम्पत्योः कलहो नास्ति तत्र श्री स्वयमागता॥
EnglishTranslation: Where fools are not worshipped, grain is well accumulated.There is no quarrel between the couple and the prosperity itself has come.

Sloka: यस्य चित्तं द्रवीभूतं कृपया सर्वजन्तुषु । तस्य ज्ञानेन मोक्षेण किं जटा भसमलेपनैः॥
EnglishTranslation: His mind is liquid, by His mercy, in all living beings.What is the use of his knowledge and liberation?

Sloka: कुराजराज्येन कृतः प्रजासुखं कुमित्रमित्रेण कुतोऽभिनिवृत्तिः। कुदारदारैश्च कुतो गृहे रतिः कृशिष्यमध्यापयतः कुतो यशः॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is the happiness of a bad friend and a friend who has been made by a bad kingdom?Where is the attraction in the house of the victims of the victims and where is the reputation of the lean person?

Sloka: न संसार भयं ज्ञानवताम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no fear of the world for the wise.

Sloka: किं किं न साधयति कल्पलतेव विद्या ॥
EnglishTranslation: What doesn’t it achieve, just as knowledge does it go to the creeper of a Kalpa?

Sloka: सुखार्थिनः कुतो विद्या नास्ति विद्यार्थिनः सुखम्। सुखार्थी वा त्यजेत् विद्यां विद्यार्थी वा त्यजेत् सुखम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is knowledge for those seeking happiness, there is no happiness for the seeker of knowledge?One who seeks happiness should abandon knowledge or one who seeks knowledge should abandon happiness.

Sloka: गुरुरग्निर्द्विजातीनां वर्णानां ब्राह्मणो गुरुः। पतिरेव गुरुः स्त्रीणां सर्वस्याभ्यगतो गुरुः॥
EnglishTranslation: The teacher is the fire of the twice-born, and the Brahmin is the teacher of the castes.The husband alone is the preceptor of all women and the preceptor has come to him.

Sloka: न निर्मिता केन न दृष्टपूर्वा न श्रूयते हेममयी कुरङ्गी । तथाऽपि तृष्णा रघुनन्दनस्य विनाशकाले विपरीतबुद्धिः॥
EnglishTranslation: Who has not created it and who has never seen it before, and it is not heard of a golden crown.Even so, at the time of destruction of the delight of the Raghus the thirst for Raghu

Sloka: यस्य बुद्धिर्बलं तस्य निर्बुद्धेस्तु कुतो बलम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is the strength of one who has the strength of his intelligence?

Sloka: राजा राष्ट्रकृतं पापं राज्ञः पापं पुरोहितः। भर्ता च स्त्रीकृतं पापं शिष्य पाप गुरुस्तथा॥
EnglishTranslation: The king is the sin committed by the nation and the priest is the sin of the king.A husband who committed a woman by a woman is a disciple and a sinner is a sinner.

Sloka: आत्मज्ञानं समारम्भः तितिक्षा धर्मनित्यता । यमर्थान्नापकर्षन्ति स वै पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Self-knowledge is the beginning of patience, patience and religion.A person who does not pull away from the material world is called a learned man.

Sloka: सर्वे चण्डस्य विभ्यति ॥
EnglishTranslation: All of them are afraid of the fierce one.

Sloka: आर्यकर्मणि रज्यन्ते भूतिकर्माणि कुर्वते। हितं च नाभ्यसूयन्ति पण्डिता भरतर्षभ ॥
EnglishTranslation: They rejoice in the noble deeds and perform the rituals of prosperity.O best of the Bharatas, learned men do not envy for their welfare.

Sloka: न हृष्यत्यात्मसम्माने नावमानेन तप्यते। गाङ्गो ह्रद ईवाक्षोभ्यो यः स पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He does not rejoice in self-respect nor tormented by insult.The Ganges, which is like a lake, is called a learned man.

Sloka: बह्वाश्र्चर्या हि मेदनी ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are many hymns of the earth.

Sloka: तावद् भयेषु भेतव्यं यावद्भयमनागतम्। आगतं तु भयं दृष्टवा प्रहर्तव्यमशङ्कया॥
EnglishTranslation: Fear in fears until fear has come.Seeing the fear that had come, he should be stricken with fear.

Sloka: दुर्जनेषु च सर्पेषु वरं सर्पो न दुर्जनः। सर्पो दंशति कालेन दुर्जनस्तु पदे-पदे ॥
EnglishTranslation: And among the wicked snakes the snake is not evil.A snake bites a snake in time, but a wicked man is at every step.

Sloka: नाक्रोशी स्यात्रावमानी परस्य मित्रद्रोही नोत निचोपसेवी। न चाभिमानी न च हीनवृत्तों रुक्षां वाचं रुषतीं वर्जयीत॥
EnglishTranslation: Nakroshi would be a Ravamani, a betrayer of friends, not a chope-server.He should not be proud, nor deficient in his conduct, nor should he avoid harsh words, anger.

Sloka: स्वमर्थं यः परित्यज्य परार्थमनुतिष्ठति। मिथ्या चरति मित्रार्थे यश्च मूढः स उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who abandons his own interest and abides for the sake of others.He who walks falsely for the sake of his friend is called a fool

Sloka: रोहते सायकैर्विद्धं वनं परशुना हतम्। वाचा दुरुक्तं बीभत्सं न संरोहति वाक्क्षतम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The forest shot by the arrows grows and killed by an axe.A terrible thing that is difficult to speak does not grow up in speech.

Sloka: लालनाद् बहवो दोषास्ताडनाद् बहवो गुणाः। तस्मात्पुत्रं च शिष्यं च ताडयेन्न तु लालयेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are many faults from nurturing many virtuesTherefore one should beat his son and disciple, but should not nurture.

Sloka: एक: पापानि कुरुते फलं भुङ्क्ते महाजन:। भोक्तारो विप्रमुच्यन्ते कर्ता दोषेण लिप्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: One commits sins and the great man enjoys the fruits.The enjoyers are released from the brāhmaṇas and the doer is tainted by the fault.

Sloka: देहाभिमानगलिते ज्ञानेन परमात्मनः। यत्र यत्र मनो याति तत्र तत्र समाधयः॥
EnglishTranslation: By the knowledge of the body's pride, the Supreme Self.Wherever the mind goes, there are meditations.

Sloka: सिंहादेकं बकादेकं शिक्षेच्चत्वारि कुक्कुटात्। वायसात्पञ्च शिक्षेच्च षट् शुनस्त्रीणि गर्दभात्॥
EnglishTranslation: One should learn one of the lions and one of the four chickens.From the crow he should learn six dogs from the donkey and from the donkey.

Sloka: कुपुत्रो जायेत क्वचिदपि कुमाता न भवति ॥
EnglishTranslation: A bad son is born and a bad mother is never born.

Sloka: किन्नु मे स्यादिदं कृत्वा किन्नु मे स्यादकुर्वतः । इति कर्माणि सञ्चिन्त्य कुरयड् कुर्याद् वा पुरुषो न वा॥
EnglishTranslation: What can I do for me and what will I do for I do not do it?Thinking thus, he should perform the Kurayad, whether he is a man or not.

Sloka: प्रायेण श्रीमतां लोके भोक्तुं शक्तिर्न विद्यते। जीर्यन्त्यपि हि काष्ठानि दरिद्राणां महीपते ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is almost no power to enjoy in the world of the rich.O King, even the wood of the poor are old, even if they are old.

Sloka: अनागतं यः कुरुते स शोभते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who does what has not come is beautiful.

Sloka: सेवाधर्मः परमगहनो ॥
EnglishTranslation: The religion of service is the supreme deep.

Sloka: एकमेवाक्षरं यस्तु गुरुः शिष्यं प्रबोधयेत् । पृथिव्यां नास्ति तद्द्रव्यं यद् दत्त्वा चाऽनृणी भवेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The teacher who awakens the disciple in the same syllable.There is nothing on earth that is not debt to give it to the person who gives it to him.

Sloka: किं करोत्येव पाण्डित्यमस्थाने विनियोजितम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: What is the use of employment in the place of the wisdom?

Sloka: मन एव मनुष्याणां कारणं बन्धमोक्षयोः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is the cause of bondage and liberation for human beings.

Sloka: धनिकः श्रोत्रियो राजा नदी वैद्यस्तु पञ्चमः। पञ्च यत्र न विद्यन्ते न तत्र दिवसे वसेत ॥
EnglishTranslation: The fifth is the rich, the listener, the king, the river, the physician.Where there are no five, one should not live in a day.

Sloka: स्वभावेन हि तुष्यन्ति देवाः सत्पुरुषाः पिताः। ज्ञातयः स्नानपानाभ्यां वाक्यदानेन पण्डिताः॥
EnglishTranslation: For by nature the gods are pleased with the gods and fathers.The wise men by giving words by bathing and drinking words

Sloka: किं कुलेन विशालेन विद्याहीने च देहिनाम्। दुष्कुलं चापि विदुषी देवैरपि हि पूज्यते॥
EnglishTranslation: What is the use of a vast family and without knowledge of the embodied.Even a learned man is worshiped even by the gods

Sloka: पितृपैतामहं राज्यं प्राप्तवान् स्वेन कर्मणा। वायुरभ्रमिवासाद्य भ्रंशयत्यनये स्थितः ॥
EnglishTranslation: I have attained the kingdom by my father and grandfather.The wind blows in the sky and moves away from the sky.

Sloka: एकोऽपि गुणवान् पुत्रो निर्गुणैश्च शतैर्वरः। एकश्चन्द्रस्तमो हन्ति न च ताराः सहस्रशः॥
EnglishTranslation: A single virtuous son is a boon by hundreds of hundreds of virtues.One moon kills darkness and not thousands of stars.

Sloka: जनिता चोपनेता च यस्तु विद्यां प्रयच्छति। अन्नदाता भयत्राता पञ्चैता पितरः स्मृताः॥
EnglishTranslation: He who gives knowledge to the mother and the leader.These five fathers are considered to be the giver of food to fear

Sloka: प्रवृत्तवाक् विचित्रकथ ऊहवान् प्रतिभानवान्। आशु ग्रन्थस्य वक्ता च यः स पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: The initiated speech was strange and talented.He who is quick to speak of the text is called a learned man.

Sloka: तृणं ब्रह्मविद स्वर्गं तृणं शूरस्य जीवनम्। जिमाक्षस्य तृणं नारी निःस्पृहस्य तृणं जगत्॥
EnglishTranslation: The grass of the Brahma-knowing is heaven, and grass is the life of a hero.A woman who has no desire for the sake of Jimaksha is the world of grass

Sloka: अनन्तशास्त्रं बहुलाश्च विद्या अल्पं च कालो बहुविघ्नता च । आसारभूतं तदुपासनीयं हंसो यथा क्षीरमिवाम्बुमध्यात्॥
EnglishTranslation: There are many infinite scriptures and many knowledges are small time and many obstaclesIt is to be worshiped as a swan like milk from the middle of the water

Sloka: दुर्बलाश्रयो दुःखमावहति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Weak sadness is due to sorrow.

Sloka: न विश्चसेदविश्चस्ते विश्चस्ते नातिविश्चसेत्। विश्चासाद् भयमुत्पन्न मुलान्यपि निकृन्तति ॥
EnglishTranslation: He will not be victimized and he will not be able to escape.From the scene, the roots of the trees are cut off from the roots.

Sloka: अश्रुतश्च समुत्रद्धो दरिद्रश्य महामनाः। अर्थांश्चाकर्मणा प्रेप्सुर्मूढ इत्युच्यते बुधैः ॥
EnglishTranslation: And unheard of, he was filled with the poor and great-minded.A person who desires wealth by inaction is called a fool by the wise.

Sloka: न मातुः परदैवतम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Not a mother of the other deity of the mother.

Sloka: किं तया क्रियते धेन्वा या न दोग्ध्रो न गर्भिणी। कोऽर्थः पुत्रेण जातेन यो न विद्वान्न भक्तिमान्॥
EnglishTranslation: What is the use of a cow that is not milked or pregnantWhat is the use of a son born of a son who is neither a learned nor a devotee.

Sloka: धनात् धर्मः भवति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Wealth is religion.

Sloka: लोभः प्रज्ञानमाहन्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Greed is the source of wisdom.

Sloka: अनारभ्या भवन्त्यर्थाः केचित्रित्यं तथाऽगताः । कृतः पुरुषकारो हि भवेद् येषु निरर्थकः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Some of the meanings are not beginnings, and so have come to be so.A man who has done a man should be useless in those who are useless

Sloka: बुद्धिर्यस्य बलं तस्य निर्बुद्धेस्तु कुतो बलम्। वने सिंहो मदोन्मत्तः शशकेन निपातितः॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is the strength of his intelligence whose strength is not enlightenedThe lion was mad in the forest and was thrown down by a rabbit

Sloka: अनभ्यासे विषं शास्त्रमजीर्णे भोजनं विषम्। दरिद्रस्य विषं गोष्ठी वृद्धस्य तरुणी विषम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Poison in non-practice is poison in digestion and poison is poison.The poison of the poor is the cowherd of the old man and the young poison is poisonous

Sloka: प्रलये भिन्नमर्यादा भवन्ति किल सागराः। सागरा भेदमिच्छन्ति प्रलयेऽपि न साधवः॥
EnglishTranslation: The oceans are different limits in the catastrophe.The oceans desire differences even at the time of annihilation

Sloka: न चातिगुणवत्स्वेषा नान्यन्तं निर्गुणेषु च। नेषा गुणान् कामयते नैर्गुण्यात्रानुरज़्यते। उन्मत्ता गौरिवान्धा श्री क्वचिदेवावतिष्ठते॥
EnglishTranslation: Nor is it excessively virtuous, nor is there any other end in the devoid of the modes.This does not desire the virtues of the non-quality.The madman is like a cow, and the goddess of fortune remains somewhere.

Sloka: कार्य पुरुषकारेण लक्ष्यं सम्पद्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: The target is achieved by the action of the man.

Sloka: कुग्रामवासः कुलहीन सेवा कुभोजन क्रोधमुखी च भार्या। पुत्रश्च मूर्खो विधवा च कन्या विनाग्निमेते प्रदहन्ति कायम्॥
EnglishTranslation: A bad village, a family without a family, a bad food and a wife to anger.A son and a fool and a widow are a daughter without fire and these burn the body

Sloka: वृत्ततस्त्वाहीनानि कुलान्यल्पधनान्यपि। कुलसंख्यां च गच्छन्ति कर्षन्ति च महद् यशः॥
EnglishTranslation: Even the families of the family without youThey go to the number of families and attract great fame

Sloka: न कुलं वृत्तहीनस्य प्रमाणमिति में मतिः । अन्तेष्वपि हि जातानां वृतमेव विशिष्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: I don’t think that the family is the proof of the circumstances.Even at the end of the body, the circumstances are superior to those who are born.

Sloka: परिश्रमस्य फलं मधुरं भवति ॥
EnglishTranslation: The fruit of hard work is sweet.

Sloka: नोपकारात् परो धर्मो नापकारादधं परम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no religion greater than benefits, nor is there any other religion than harm.

Sloka: परस्परस्य मर्माणि ये भाषन्ते नराधमाः। ते एव विलयं यान्ति वल्मीकोदरसर्पवत्॥
EnglishTranslation: Those who speak the hearts of each other are the lowest of men.They alone merge like an anthill and a snake

Sloka: श्रुत्वा धर्म विजानाति श्रुत्वा त्यजति दुर्मतिम्। श्रुत्वा ज्ञानमवाप्नोति श्रुत्वा मोक्षमवाप्नुयात्॥
EnglishTranslation: He hears the righteousness of the righteous and hears the wicked.Hearing, he attains knowledge, and by hearing, he attains liberation.

Sloka: सर्वे मित्राणि समृध्दिकाले ॥
EnglishTranslation: All the friends are in the time of prosperity.

Sloka: आतुरे व्यसने प्राप्ते दुर्भिक्षे शत्रुसण्कटे। राजद्वारे श्मशाने च यात्तिष्ठति स बान्धवः ॥
EnglishTranslation: In afflicted adversity in the famine of the enemyHe goes to the gate of the king and to the cemetery and to stay that relative.

Sloka: भावमिच्छति सर्वस्य नाभावे कुरुते मनः। सत्यवादी मृदृर्दान्तो यः स उत्तमपूरुषः ॥
EnglishTranslation: He desires the feeling of everything and does not make the mind in the absence.He who is truthful and soft-spoken is the best man.

Sloka: सुखार्थी चेत् त्यजेद्विद्यां त्यजेद्विद्यां विद्यार्थी चेत् त्यजेत्सुखम्। सुखार्थिनः कुतो विद्या कुतो विद्यार्थिनः सुखम्॥
EnglishTranslation: If one seeks happiness, one should abandon knowledge, and if one seeks knowledge, one should abandon happiness.Where is knowledge for those seeking happiness and where is happiness for those seeking knowledge?

Sloka: सत्यं माता पिता ज्ञानं धर्मो भ्राता दया सखा। शान्तिः पत्नी क्षमा पुत्रः षडेते मम बान्धवाः॥
EnglishTranslation: Truth, mother, father, knowledge, righteousness, brother, compassion and friend.Shanti, wife, Kshama, son, these six are my relatives.

Sloka: सुख-दुर्लभं हि सदा सुखम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Happiness is always rare for happiness.

Sloka: दुराचारी च दुर्दृष्टिर्दुराऽऽवासी च दुर्जनः। यन्मैत्री क्रियते पुम्भिर्नरः शीघ्र विनश्यति ॥
EnglishTranslation: He is a bad guy and a bad guard and a bad resident and a bad man.The friendship that a man makes a man is quickly destroyed.

Sloka: को लोकमाराधयितुं समर्थः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Translation Error

Sloka: अनागत विधाता च प्रत्युत्पन्नगतिस्तथा। द्वावातौ सुखमेवेते यद्भविष्यो विनश्यति॥
EnglishTranslation: and the uncoming creator and the reproductive movement.These are the happiness of the two winds that the future is destroyed.

Sloka: दुष्टा भार्या शठं मित्रं भृत्यश्चोत्तरदायकः। ससर्पे गृहे वासो मृत्युरेव न संशयः॥
EnglishTranslation: Translation Error

Sloka: विद्या योगेन रक्ष्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Knowledge is protected by yoga.

Sloka: वित्तेन रक्ष्यते धर्मो विद्या योगेन रक्ष्यते। मृदुना रक्ष्यते भूपः सत्स्त्रिया रक्ष्यते गृहम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Finance is protected by righteousness, knowledge is protected by yoga.The king is protected by the soft and the house is protected by a woman

Sloka: सुश्रान्तोऽपि वहेद् भारं शीतोष्णं न पश्यति। सन्तुष्टश्चरतो नित्यं त्रीणि शिक्षेच्च गर्दभात्॥
EnglishTranslation: Even if he is very tired he carries the burden he does not see the cold and heat.Satisfied one should always be satisfied with the donkeys from the donkey

Sloka: अनवस्थितकायस्य न जने न वने सुखम्। जनो दहति संसर्गाद् वनं सगविवर्जनात॥
EnglishTranslation: Translation Error

Sloka: अनर्थंमर्थंतः पश्यत्रर्थं चैवाप्यनर्थतः। इन्द्रियैरजितैर्बालः सुदुःखं मन्यते सुखम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Translation Error

Sloka: कृतज्ञः सर्वलोकेषु पूज्यो भवति सर्वदा ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who is grateful is always worshiped in all the worlds.

Sloka: दीयमानं हि नापैति भूय एवाभिवर्तते ॥
EnglishTranslation: When the gift is given, it does not come back to it.

Sloka: द्वे कर्मणी नरः कुर्वन्नस्मिंल्लोके विरोचते। अब्रुवं परुषं कश्चित् असतोऽनर्चयंस्तथा ॥
EnglishTranslation: A man who performs two actions shines in this world.Someone who is not worshiping the truth is harshly harshly.

Sloka: आत्मनाऽऽत्मानमन्विच्छेन्मनोबुद्धीन्द्रियैर्यतैः। आत्मा ह्वोवात्मनो बन्धुरात्मैव रिपुरात्मनः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Translation Error

Sloka: वरं वनं व्याघ्रगजेन्द्रसेवितं द्रुमालयः पत्रफलाम्बु सेवनम्। तृणेशु शय्या शतजीर्णवल्कलं न बन्धुमध्ये धनहीनजीवनम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The forest is a forest, a garland of trees and elephants, a garland of leaves, fruits and water.There is no life without wealth in the midst of a relative with grass in grass

Sloka: दातृत्वं प्रियवक्तृत्वं धीरत्वमुचितज्ञता। अभ्यासेन न लभ्यन्ते चत्वारः सहजा गुणाः॥
EnglishTranslation: The giver is the beloved speaker, the patience is the right knowledge.The four inherent qualities are not attained by practice.

Sloka: दुःसाध्यमपि सुसाध्यं करोत्युपायज्ञः ॥
EnglishTranslation: A person who knows the means does what is difficult to achieve and is well achievable.

Sloka: सामुद्रिकं वणिजं चोरपूर्व शलाकधूर्त्त च चिकित्सकं च। अरिं च मित्रं च कुशीलवं च नैतान्साक्ष्ये त्वधिकुर्वीतसप्त॥
EnglishTranslation: The sea, the merchant, the thief, the bar, the slave, the physician, and the physician.There are seven enemies of the enemy and the friend and the good of the virtuous

Sloka: यत्नवान् सुखमेधते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Efforts are happily prosperous.

Sloka: जानीयात्प्रेषणेभृत्यान् बान्धवान्व्यसनाऽऽगमे। मित्रं याऽऽपत्तिकालेषु भार्यां च विभवक्षये ॥
EnglishTranslation: He should know the servants of the sending servants in the coming of the trouble.She is a friend at the time of trouble and her wife is at the end of her opulence.

Sloka: विद्यया लभते ज्ञानम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: By knowledge one attains knowledge.

Sloka: अन्यायोपार्जितं वित्तं दशवर्षाणि तिष्ठति । प्राप्ते चैकादशे वर्षे समूलं तद् विनश्यति॥
EnglishTranslation: The money earned in unjustly remains for ten years.When the eleventh year comes it is completely destroyed

Sloka: न वैरमुद्दीपयति प्रशान्तं न दर्पमारोहति नास्तमेति । न दुर्गतोऽस्मीति करोत्यकार्यं तमार्यशीलं परमाहुरार्याः ॥
EnglishTranslation: It does not burn enmity, but it does not rise, nor does it rise, nor does it set out.The noble ones say that he is not afflicted by saying that he is not miserable

Sloka: धर्मार्थकाममोश्रेषु यस्यैकोऽपि न विद्यते। जन्म जन्मानि मर्त्येषु मरणं तस्य केवलम्॥
EnglishTranslation: He who has none of Dharma, Artha, Kama and Moshra.Births and births among mortals are his only death.

Sloka: आयुः कर्म वित्तञ्च विद्या निधनमेव च। पञ्चैतानि हि सृज्यन्ते गर्भस्थस्यैव देहिनः॥
EnglishTranslation: Life, action, wealth, knowledge and death.For these five are created by the embodied in the womb of the embodied.

Sloka: सुव्याहृतानि सुक्तानि सुकृतानि ततस्ततः। सञ्चिन्वन् धीर आसीत् शिलाहरी शिलं यथा ॥
EnglishTranslation: They were well uttered and well-dressed and well-dressed here and there.The steadfast rock like a rock was gathered together.

Sloka: गृहीतेवाक्यो नयविद् वदान्यः शेषात्रभोक्ता ह्यविहिंसकश्च। नानार्थकृत्याकुलितः कृतज्ञः सत्यो मृदुः स्वर्गमुपैति विद्वान् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The statement of the grasp of the law is generous, and the rest is the enjoyer and the non-violent.A learned man who is agitated by various purposes and who is grateful and who is truthful and soft attains heaven

Sloka: अर्चयेदेव मित्राणि सति वाऽसति वा धने। नानर्थयन् प्रजानति मित्राणं सारफल्गुताम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: One should worship friends in the case of wealth or wealth.He does not useless to know his friends, but it is the source of all fruition.

Sloka: यथाशक्ति चिकीर्षन्ति यथाशक्ति च कुर्वते। न किञ्चिदवमन्यन्ते नराः पण्डितबुद्धयः ॥
EnglishTranslation: They want to do as much as they can and do as much as they can.Men who are wise in minds do not despise anything.

Sloka: सुदुर्बलं नावजानाति कञ्चित् युक्तो रिपुं सेवते बुद्धिपूर्वम् । न विग्रहं रोचयते बलस्थैः काले च यो विक्रमते स धीरः ॥
EnglishTranslation: No one who is equipped with a very weak man serves an enemy with his intelligence.He who does not like to fight against the forces and who is prowess in time is a steadfast person.

Sloka: वृद्धसेवया विज्ञानत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Vrdhasevaya vijnanat.

Sloka: पितृदोषेण मूर्खता ॥
EnglishTranslation: Pitradoshane foolishness

Sloka: विद्या मित्रं प्रवासेषु भार्या मित्रं गृहेषु च। व्याधितस्यौषधं मित्रं धर्मो मित्रं मृतस्य च॥
EnglishTranslation: Vidya is a friend in travels and a wife is a friend in homes.Medicine is a friend of the sick and righteousness is a friend of the dead

Sloka: सक्ष्मात् सर्वेषों कार्यसिद्धिभर्वति ॥
EnglishTranslation: From the subtlety all these things are fulfilled.

Sloka: चिरनिरूपणीयो हि व्यक्तिस्वभावः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The nature of the individual is to be determined for a long time.

Sloka: दृष्टिपूतं न्यसेत् पादं वस्त्रपूतं जलं पिवेत्। शास्त्रपूतं वदेद् वाक्यं मनः पूतं समाचरेत्॥
EnglishTranslation: One should place the feet clean of the eyes and drink the water purified by clothing.One should speak the words purified by the scriptures and practice the mind purified.

Sloka: येषां न विद्या न तपो न दानं न चापि शीलं च गुणो न धर्मः। ते मर्त्यलोके भुवि भारभूता मनुष्यरुपेण मृगाश्चरन्ति॥
EnglishTranslation: Those who have no knowledge, no austerities, no charity, no virtue, no virtue, no righteousness.They roam the deer in the form of men in the world of mortals in the form of a human being.

Sloka: अनाहूत: प्रविशति अपृष्टो बहु भाषेते । अविश्चस्ते विश्चसिति मूढचेता नराधम: ॥
EnglishTranslation: Uninvited, he enters and speaks a lot without being asked.The foolish mind of the lowest of men is called Avi and Avischa.

Sloka: अर्थागमो नित्यमरोगिता च प्रिया च भार्य प्रियवादिनी च । वश्यश्च पुत्रोऽर्थकरी च विद्या षट् जीवलोकस्य सुखानि राजन् ॥

Sloka: अर्थमूलं धरकामौ ॥
EnglishTranslation: The root of the meaning of the earth is the root of the earth.

Sloka: न्यायार्जितस्य द्रव्यस्य बोद्धव्यौ द्वावतिक्रमौ । अपात्रे प्रतिपत्तिश्च पात्रे चाप्रतिपादनम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are two transgressions of the property earned by justice.The assumption in the unworthy and the representation of the vessel.

Sloka: धर्मार्थकाममोक्षाणां यस्यैकोऽपि न विद्वते। अजागलस्तनस्येव तस्य जन्म निरर्थकम्॥
EnglishTranslation: He who has no one among the learned, Dharma, Artha, Kama and Moksha.His birth is useless as the breasts of an unborn child.

Sloka: बुद्धो कलूषभूतायां विनाशे प्रत्युपस्थिते। अनयो नयसङ्कशो हृदयात्रावसर्पति ॥
EnglishTranslation: The Buddha is in the state of destruction in the corrupt.These are the symptoms of the judgment that creeps from the heart.

Sloka: कवयः किं न पश्यन्ति किं न कुर्वन्ति योषितः। मद्यपा किं न जल्पन्ति किं न खादन्ति वायसाः॥
EnglishTranslation: What do the poets not see and what do women not do?Why don't the drunken wines talk and why don't the crows eat?

Sloka: गन्धेन गावः पश्यन्ति वेदैः पश्यन्ति ब्राह्मणाः। चारैः पश्यन्ति राजानश्चक्षुर्भ्यामितरे जनाः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The cows see the cows with their fragrance and the Brahmins see with the Vedas.Kings look at the eyes and other people with their eyes.

Sloka: त्यजेद्धर्म दयाहीनं विद्याहीनं गुरुं त्यजेत्। त्यजेत्क्रोधमुखी भार्या निःस्नेहान्बान्धवांस्यजेत्॥
EnglishTranslation: One should abandon righteousness without mercy and abandon the teacher without knowledge.A wife should give up her anger and should give up her affectionate relatives

Sloka: प्राप्यापदं न व्यथते कदाचि- दुद्योगमन्विच्छति चाप्रमत्तः। दुःखं च काले सहते महात्मा धुरन्धरस्तस्य जिताः सप्तनाः ॥
EnglishTranslation: He never suffers from the danger of attaining the calamity and never seeks to seek the industry.The great soul Dhurandhar who endures suffering in due course of time has been conquered by him

Sloka: षड् दोषा: पुरुषेणेह हातव्या भूतिमिच्छिता । निद्रा तन्द्रा भयं क्रोध आलस्यं दीर्घसूत्रता ॥
EnglishTranslation: Six faults should be lost in this world by a man who desires prosperity.Sleep, drowsiness, fear, anger, laziness, and long threads.

Sloka: इन्द्रियाणि च संयम्य बकवत्पण्डितो नरः। देशकालः बलं ज्ञात्वा सर्वकार्याणि साधयेत्॥
EnglishTranslation: And a man who has restrained his senses like a duck.Knowing the strength of the place and time one should accomplish all the tasks.

Sloka: ऋणकर्ता पिता शत्रुर्माता च व्यभिचारिणी। भार्या रुपवती शत्रुः पुत्र शत्रु र्न पण्डितः॥
EnglishTranslation: The debtor is the father, the enemy, the mother, the deviant.A wife is beautiful and an enemy is not a wise enemy

Sloka: न दैवप्रमाणानां कार्यसिद्धिः ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no accomplishment of the work of destiny.

Sloka: यथा खनित्वा खनित्रेण भूतले वारि विन्दति। तथा गुरुगतां विद्यां शुश्रुषुरधिगच्छति॥
EnglishTranslation: as he digs and finds water on the ground with a mine.Thus he attains the knowledge of the teacher who has attained knowledge.

Sloka: असंहताः विंनश्यन्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: They are destroyed by the unconnected.

Sloka: न जीयते चानुजिगीषतेऽन्यान् न वैरकृच्चाप्रतिघातकश्च। निन्दाप्रशंसासु तमस्वभावो न शोचते ह्रष्यति नैव चायम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He does not live and sing to others, nor does he oppose the enemy.In condemnation and praises, the nature of darkness does not grieve for the sake of the Lord.

Sloka: वाक्सायका वदनात्रिष्पतन्ति यैराहतः शोचति रात्र्यहानि। परस्य नामर्मसु ते पतन्ति तान् पण्डितो नावसृजेत् परेभ्यः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The words of the speaker fall into the three faces of the night and the days of the night.A learned person should not release those who fall into the names of others.

Sloka: किं जातैर्बहुभिः पुत्रैः शोकसन्तापकारकैः। वरमेकः कुलावल्भबो यत्र विश्राम्यते कुलम्॥
EnglishTranslation: What is the use of many sons who cause grief and sorrowThere is only one boon in the family where the family rests.

Sloka: एकोदरसमुद्भूता एक नक्षत्र जातका। न भवन्ति समा शीले यथा बदरिकण्टकाः॥
EnglishTranslation: A constellation born of one abdomen.They are not equal in character as the thorns of the peacocks.

Sloka: अन्तो नास्ति पिपासायाः ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no end to thirst.

Sloka: सत्यं रुपं श्रुतं विद्या कौल्यं शीलं बलं धनम्। शौर्यं य च चित्रभाष्यं च दशेमे स्वर्गयोनयः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Truth, form, hearing, knowledge, courage, virtue, strength and wealth.They are the sons of heaven and the commentary on Chitra and the commentary on the Chitra.

Sloka: गूढ मैथुनकारित्वं काले काले च संग्रहम्। अप्रमत्तवचनमविश्वासं पञ्च शिक्षेच्च वायसात्॥
EnglishTranslation: Mysterious sexualness and collection from time to time.He should learn five unbelieving words from the crow.

Sloka: सर्वौषधीनामममृतं प्रधानं सर्वेषु सौख्येष्वशनं प्रधानम्। सर्वेन्द्रियाणां नयनं प्रधानं सर्वेषु गात्रेषु शिरः प्रधानम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The nectar, the chief of all herbs, is the principal of all pleasures.The eyes of all the senses are the chief, and the head is the chief in all the limbs.

Sloka: सोत्साहानां नास्त्यसाध्यं नराणाम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is nothing impossible for men to enthusiasm.

Sloka: संसारातपदग्धानां त्रयो विश्रान्तिहेतवः। अपत्यं च कलत्रं च सतां संगतिरेव च॥
EnglishTranslation: The three causes of rest for those who are burnt by the heat of the world.A child and a wife and a association with the virtuous.

Sloka: एकः क्षमावतां दोषो द्वतीयो नोपपद्यते। यदेनं क्षमया युक्तमशक्तं मन्यते जनः ॥
EnglishTranslation: One fault of the forgiving does not arise.That which people think it is unable to do so that it is fit for forgiveness

Sloka: मौंन सर्व थेसाधकम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Suman all the time.

Sloka: आपदर्थे धनं रक्षेद् दारान् रक्षेद् धनैरपि। आत्मानं सततं रक्षेद् दारैरपि धनैरपि ॥
EnglishTranslation: He should protect wealth for disaster and protect his wife with wealth.One should constantly protect oneself by wives, wealth and wealth.

Sloka: सन्तोषस्त्रिषु कर्तव्यः स्वदारे भोजने धने। त्रिषु चैव न कर्तव्योऽध्ययने जपदानयोः॥
EnglishTranslation: Contentment should be done in the three, in their wives, in food, in wealth.And in the three, even in the three, in study, in chanting and giving.

Sloka: अकामान् कामयति यः कामयानान् परित्यजेत्। बलवन्तं च यो द्वेष्टि तमाहुर्मूढचेतसम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who desires unwillingly and abandons desires.He who hates the stronger and who hates him is called a fool.

Sloka: हेतुतः शत्रुमित्रे भविष्यतः ॥
EnglishTranslation: He will be the enemy of the enemy.

Sloka: संतोषवत् न किमपि सुखम् अस्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no happiness like satisfaction.

Sloka: नाप्राप्यमभिवाञ्छन्ति नष्टं नेच्छन्ति शोचितुम् । आपत्सु च न मुह्यन्ति नराः पण्डितबुद्धयः ॥
EnglishTranslation: They don’t want to get unattainable and they don’t want to grieve for what they have lost.Men of learned intelligence are not deluded in calamities

Sloka: मित्रता-उपकारफलं मित्रमपकारोऽरिलक्षणम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Friendship and benefits are the fruits of a friend and a sign of harm.

Sloka: संस्कृतं देवानं भाषा अस्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Sanskrit is the language of the gods.

Sloka: कश्चित् कस्यचिन्मित्रं, न कश्चित् कस्यचित् रिपु:। अर्थतस्तु निबध्यन्ते, मित्राणि रिपवस्तथा ॥
EnglishTranslation: No one is a friend of anyone, no one is an enemy of anyone.In fact, the friends and enemies are bound by their enemies.

Sloka: सकुले योजयेत्कन्या पुत्रं पुत्रं विद्यासु योजयेत्। व्यसने योजयेच्छत्रुं मित्रं धर्मे नियोजयेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: A daughter should be added to the family and a son should be used in knowledge.One should engage in adversity and engage a friend in religious principles.

Sloka: आलसस्य लब्धमपि रक्षितुं न शक्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: It is not possible to protect the lazy even if it is found.

Sloka: पंचैव पूजयन् लोके यश: प्राप्नोति केवलं । देवान् पितॄन् मनुष्यांश्च भिक्षून् अतिथि पंचमान् ॥
EnglishTranslation: One who worships the five worlds attains fame in this world.The fifth guest was the demigods, the forefathers, the human beings, the monks.

Sloka: धनहीनो न च हीनश्च धनिक स सुनिश्चयः। विद्या रत्नेन हीनो यः स हीनः सर्ववस्तुषु॥
EnglishTranslation: He is without wealth and is not deficient in wealth.He who is devoid of gems is devoid of all things.

Sloka: यदि सन्तं सेवति यद्यसन्तं तपस्विनं यदि वा स्तेनमेव। वासो यथा रङ्गवशं प्रयाति तथा स तेषां वशमभ्युपैति ॥
EnglishTranslation: If he serves a saint, if he is an unrighteous ascetic or a thief.Just as clothing goes under the control of the colors, so does he come under his control.

Sloka: अपुत्रस्य गृहं शून्यं दिशः शून्यास्त्वबान्धवाः। मूर्खस्य हृदयं शून्यं सर्वशून्यं दरिद्रता॥
EnglishTranslation: The house of a son without a son is empty and the directions are empty and relatives.The heart of a fool is empty of all, and poverty is empty.

Sloka: राजपत्नी गुरोः पत्नी मित्रपत्नी तथैव च। पत्नीमाता स्वमाता च पञ्चैताः मातर स्मृताः॥
EnglishTranslation: The wife of the king's wife is the wife of a friendThe five mothers are the mothers and their mothers are said to be their mothers

Sloka: आरोग्यमानृण्यमविप्रवासः सद्भिर्मनुष्यैस्सह संप्रयोगः। स्वप्रत्यया वृत्तिरभीतवासः षट् जीवलोकस्य सुखानि राजन् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Healing, debt, and universal exile and association with good men.O King, there are the pleasures of the six living entities of the living entities, their own beliefs, their own beliefs.

Sloka: सदा सत्यं वदेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: One should always speak the truth.

Sloka: एकं हन्यान्न वा हन्यादिषुर्मुक्तो धनुष्मता। बुद्धिर्बुद्धिमतोत्सृष्टा हन्याद् राष्ट्रम सराजकम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He kills one or not kills him and is freed from the bowIntelligence and intelligence should kill the kingdom and the kingdom.

Sloka: स्वयं कर्म कोत्यात्मा स्वयं तत्फलमश्नुते। स्वयं भ्रमति संसारे स्वयं तस्माद्विमुच्यते॥
EnglishTranslation: The self-action itself enjoys the fruits of that self.He himself wanders in this world and himself is liberated.

Sloka: स्वभावो दुरतिक्रमः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Nature is difficult to transgress.

Sloka: अभ्यासाद्धार्यते विद्या कुलं शीलेन धार्यते। गुणेन ज्ञायते त्वार्य कोपो नेत्रेण गम्यते॥
EnglishTranslation: Knowledge is held by practice and the family is held by virtue.It is known by virtue, O noble anger, and by the eyes.

Sloka: इज्याध्ययनदानानि तपः सत्यं क्षमा घृणा। अलोभ इति मार्गोऽयं धर्मस्याष्टविधः स्मृत ॥
EnglishTranslation: Sacrifice, study, gifts, austerity, truth, forgiveness, hatred.This path of religion is called alobha, which is eightfold.

Sloka: वाचा च मनसः शौचं शौचमिन्द्रियनिग्रहः। सर्वभूतदया शौचमेतचछौचं परमार्थिनाम्॥
EnglishTranslation: And by speech, purity, purity, restraint of the senses.This is the purity of the supremely seeking the purity of the compassion of all beings

Sloka: साधुम्यस्ते निवर्तन्ते पुत्रः मित्राणि बान्धवाः। ये च तैः सह गन्तारस्तद्धर्मात्सुकृतं कुलम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Your sons and relatives are with friends and relativesAnd those who go with them are a good family by virtue of their duty.

Sloka: वह्वशी स्वल्पसन्तुष्टः सुनिद्रो लघुचेतनः। स्वामिभक्तश्च शूरश्च षडेते श्वानतो गुणाः॥
EnglishTranslation: Vahvashi is slightly satisfied, sleepy, light-conscious.These six dogs are devoted to their master and brave

Sloka: अर्थनाश मनस्तापं गृहिण्याश्चरितानि च। नीचं वाक्यं चापमानं मतिमान्न प्रकाशयेत॥
EnglishTranslation: Destruction of wealth and mental anguish and the character of a householder.A wise man should not reveal a low words to an insult.

Sloka: यस्य कृत्यं न जानन्ति मन्त्रं वा मन्त्रितं परे। कृतमेवास्य जानन्ति स वै पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Whoever does not know the mantra or the mantra is consulted by others.They know what he has done and he is called a learned man.

Sloka: निस्पृहो नाधिकारी स्यान्न कामी भण्डनप्रिया। नो विदग्धः प्रियं ब्रूयात् स्पष्ट वक्ता न वञ्चकः॥
EnglishTranslation: He should not be unhappy, nor is he a lustful man, nor is he loved by the recipient.Let him who is burnt to speak to us speak pleasantly or the deceitful speaker

Sloka: एतयोपमया धीरः सत्रमेत बलीयसे । इन्द्राय स प्रणमते नमते यो बलीयसे ॥
EnglishTranslation: By this analogy, the steadfast, you are strong, this is the satra.He who offers obeisances to Indra, who is strong, bows down to him.

Sloka: छात्राः अनुशासिताः भवेयुः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Students should be disciplined.

Sloka: स्वजातिः दुरतिक्रमा ॥
EnglishTranslation: His own race is difficult to transgress.

Sloka: यद् भविष्यो विनश्यति ॥
EnglishTranslation: That is what the future is destroyed.

Sloka: यस्यार्थास्तस्य मित्राणि यस्यार्थास्तस्य बान्धवाः। यस्यार्थाः स पुमांल्लोके यस्यार्थाः स च पण्डितः॥
EnglishTranslation: He who has the meanings of his friends and who has meanings are his relatives.He who has meanings is a man in this world and he who has meanings is a wise man.

Sloka: अधमा धनमिच्छन्ति धनं मानं च मध्यमाः। उत्तमा मानमिच्छन्ति मानो हि महतां धनम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The lowest want wealth and the middle ones want wealth and honor.The best desire honor for great wealth
